cmput301f18t18.health_detective.data.repository

Class ElasticSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301f18t18.health_detective.data.repository.ElasticSearchController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProblemRepo, RecordRepo, UserRepo

    public class ElasticSearchController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProblemRepo, RecordRepo, UserRepo
    Singleton that holds the information and methods for interfacing with elastic search
